name: [Prototype] Monkey World
description:
This is a hobby platformer project in prototype state. You can use controller or keyboard to play. I am looking for feedback so please tell me what you think in the comments. If possible some video recording of your first playthrough would be even better. 

Keyboard:

WASD to move

M key to jump

N key to dash

Space bar to high jump

Controller:

Left stick or d-pad to move

A to jump (south button)

X to Dash (west button)

Left shoulder button to highjump
